app_name: My Talking Tom 2 for Android - Free App Download
about_section: My Talking Tom 2 is a casual game developed by Outfit7 Limited. The APK has been available since September 2018 . In the last 30 days, the app was downloaded about 8.4 million times. It's top ranked. It's rated 4.35 out of 5 stars, based on 5.6 million ratings. The last update of the app was on April 7, 2025 . My Talking Tom 2 has a content rating "Everyone" . My Talking Tom 2 has an APK download size of 164.74 MB and the latest version available is 25.1.3.11738 . Designed for Android version 6.0+ . My Talking Tom 2 is FREE to download.
app_description:
The superstar virtual cat is going on the ultimate pet adventure, and with you, it's going to be more fun than ever! Your favorite funny friend is ready to dazzle you with his new wardrobe, amazing skills, and special features.
What You Can Do:
- Learn New Skills: Teach Tom cool tricks and skills like playing drums, basketball, and boxing. He'll be the most talented cat around!
- Taste the Latest Snacks: Discover and feed Tom various delicious and funny snacks. From ice cream to sushi, Tom loves it all! Do you dare to give him a hot chili pepper?
- Stay Clean: Help Tom stay fresh and clean with fun activities like bathing and brushing his teeth. Keep him squeaky clean!
- Pop to the Toilet: Yes, even Tom needs bathroom breaks, and it's as funny as it sounds! Help him out and make sure he's comfy.
- Explore New Worlds: Travel with Tom to exciting new places and discover hidden surprises. Fly to different islands with special flight tokens!
- Collect Clothes, Furniture, and Special Memories: Customize Tom's look with crazy outfits and decorate his home with funky furniture.
- Gacha Goodies: Unlock awesome rewards and surprises by doing different activities. Get cool outfits, delicious snacks, and more!
Extra Fun Activities:
- Play on Giant Swing and Trampoline: Let Tom swing high and jump around for some extra laughs.
- Cook Smoothies: Blend up delicious and wacky smoothies for Tom to enjoy.
- Heal Booboos: Take care of Tom when he gets hurt and make sure he's back to his playful self in no time.
- Mini Games and Puzzles: Challenge yourself with entertaining mini-games and puzzles that keep you hooked for hours.
- Keep Playing: See how Talking Tom's backyard changes into a Candy Kingdom, Pirate Island, Underwater Home, and other magical worlds, where you can dive into the endless fun with Tom and his pet friends.
This virtual pet game is packed with adventure, laughter, and unforgettable moments! Make sure you capture them all!
From Outfit7, creators of the hit games My Talking Angela, My Talking Angela 2 and My Talking Tom Friends.
This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising;
- Links that direct customers to Outfit7’s websites and other apps;
- Personalization of content to encourage users to play the app again;
- The option to make in-app purchases;
- Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player’s progress;
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money.
Terms of use: https://talkingtomandfriends.com/eula/en/
Privacy policy for games: https://talkingtomandfriends.com/privacy-policy-games/en
Customer support: support@outfit7.com
Recent changes:
Bug fixes and minor gameplay improvements.
